Entry.JapaneseText: 本当にこの子、大丈夫なの？ 気が付いたら、また<Eugene>のコトを……
Entry.EnglishText: Should we really be helping her? When she comes to, she might attack you again...

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺はその子が赤ん坊だった頃から知っている。 本当はとても心優しい娘だ。
Entry.EnglishText: I have known her since she was a baby. She's actually a very kindhearted girl.

Entry.JapaneseText: 父の事もそれだけ愛していた。 俺を許せない気持ちも理解できる……
Entry.EnglishText: She loved her father more than anything, so I can understand why she wouldn't forgive me.

Entry.JapaneseText: それだけに俺はつらい…… もし<Annie>に殺されるなら俺は……
Entry.EnglishText: That alone pains me... And in the event that she takes my life, I...

Entry.JapaneseText: やめてよ、<Eugene>!! それ以上、 ヘンなコト言うとボク、本気で怒るヨ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Cut it out, <Eugene>! If you keep saying stupid things like that, then I'm gonna really get mad!
